lines.text: It is I who makes the policy of this realm, I and I alone!
May I compliment you, Madame, on this most beautiful palace? There is no other like it in all of Europe.
It was my father's. I'll tell him when I see him.

[not fully understanding her answer]
Yes... but King Henry is dead. Madame jests?
There can be no funeral without a corpse.
[the Queen enters as Raleigh is on his knees trying to pick up Beth Throgmorton's broken pearl necklace]

[to Beth]
Is this your pet swine? You've cast your pearls before him.
And what is your next campaign?
I've already launched on it, Ma'am. My next campaign is you.
Indeed I pity you. You have no ships and the Queen has a new lap dog.
Dogs bark. And if they bark long enough and loud enough - they're listened to. I shall have my ships.
